text: Turki Mubarak Abdallah Ahmed al-Binali (3 September 1984 - 31 May 2017) was a Bahraini Islamic scholar and senior member of ISIS. He was the head of the Office of Investigation and Studies, which dealed with religious issues and issuing religious rulings. This caused him to have great influence within the group. == Works == His works include: * Sharh Nawaqidh al-Islam (explaination of the Nullifiers of Islam) == References == == Notes == Category:1984 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Bahraini people Category:Islamic State people Category:Deaths by airstrike
title: Turki al-Binali
